subject: New Hack
author: Nick
full_text:
Hey. We're about ready to buy the newest RS hack radio (the 200-125). I was wondering if we 
needed to buy an ac adaptor for it.  It seems simple enough, but if i need it i have access to 
crazy electronic people (the booth techies).  I saved the directions Bruce and various other 
people posted.  

Thanks

Peace,
Nick
